import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get user achievements"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/{UserId}/achievements"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the list of achievements earned by a specific user. Use this to display badges, recognize milestones, or drive gamification features in user profiles.

**Prerequisites**
1. **UserId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) to locate the user. Extract `Items[].UserId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for the user: [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) â†’ extract UserId.
2. Fetch achievements: [GET /api/v1.0/users/\{UserId\}/achievements](/docs/api/users/get-user-achievements).
3. Use returned AchievementId values when calling [POST /api/v1.0/users/\{UserId\}/achievements/award/\{AchievementId\}](/docs/api/users/award-achievement).

**Minimal Required Fields**: UserId (path)

**Notes**: Returns an empty list if the user has not earned any achievements yet.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"UserId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the user whose achievements to retrieve","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
